subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Doc Rivers has a chance to become the fifth coach in franchise history to win two or more N.B.A. titles, joining K. C. Jones, Bill Russell, Tommy Heinsohn and Red Auerbach.
snippet: Doc Rivers has a chance to become the fifth coach in franchise history to win two or more N.B.A. titles, joining K. C. Jones, Bill Russell, Tommy Heinsohn and Red Auerbach.
